org.linqs.psl.reasoner.bool

Class BooleanMCSat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.bool.BooleanMCSat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reasoner

    public class BooleanMCSat
extends Object
implements Reasoner
    Implementation of MC-Sat, which approximates the marginal probability that each atom has value 1 in a Boolean domain. Marginal probabilities will be set as the atoms' truth values. This class supports free RandomVariableAtoms and RandomVariableAtoms that are each constrained by a single GroundValueConstraint. It also assumes that all ObservedAtoms have Boolean truth values. Its behavior is not defined otherwise.
    Author:
    Stephen Bach
